name: immortality
description: Cannot die. they will, somehow, recover or be returned to life, unless certain conditions are met.

name: Intangibility
description: Can pass through solid objects and walls.

name: Invisibility
description: Can become invisible at will, though may be visible to certain individuals or under specific circumstances.

name: plague bringer
description: disease and vermin thrive when a vampire is nearby.

name: Master Vampire
description: the vampire controls all the vampires they have created.
